overview: Charulata is a 2013 Indian Bengali film, directed by Biswajit Ghosh and Prasenjit Ghosh and produced by White Horse Picture. The film stars Pritha Sur, Rupam, Subir Sanyal, Sritama Das, Pradip Das, Kamalakanto Dutta and Rupa Guria in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ekalabya.
title: Charulata
